It was produced by Knowles and Harrison and released as the album&#039;s second single in fall 2004. The song peaked at number 1 in Australia and number 3 in the United States, where it became the group&#039;s ninth and final consecutive top hit, and peaked within the top 5 in New Zealand, the UK, Denmark, Ireland, Israel, Finland, Italy, Greece and Switzerland. The song also was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration category and won the group a Soul Train Lady of Soul Award for Best R&B/Soul Single by a Group, Band or Duo.

Soldier was performed by Beyonce on the Experience tour. It was performed as a remix in a Destiny&#039;s Child medley. The remix contained a sample of the 2007 hit Crank That (Soulja Boy).
